price: 82. Qofkii jeesada intaas kaddib, kuwaa weeye kuwa ah caasiyaasha.
arabic: فَمَن تَوَلَّىٰ بَعۡدَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡفَٰسِقُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: faman tawallā baʿda dhālika fa-ulāika humu al-fāsiqūna
